title: Hyprcursor Is Simply A Better Way To Do Cursors
description:
For a very long time now the way we handle cursors on Linux through a system called Xcursor and that's also on Wayland but who says we can't do it better and that's exactly what Vaxry is attempting to do with Hyprcursor
